WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was specifically taken out of the program and we have another issue already open about it
WorkItem.Description:
I'm a fan of your fantastic calculator :-)
Very often I use it to check out what will be the best combination for my gear equipment.
Since two weeks I am using a glyphe with good dps results in ICC.
Could you please insert the Glyphe of Fire Nova in the calculator?
I think it would be a great help for me checking dps, glyphe combinations etc.
 
Charname : Flens
Realm : Perenolde
EU Server
Class : Shaman
Model : Enhance
 
In every case : Thank you for this helpfull program!
